languages.text: {n}В голосе Вигдис звучит чудовищное напряжение, но нет и намека на постыдную панику.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, на борту появились варп-отродья. Мы отрезали им путь, разгерметизировав один из лазаретов, лежавший на их пути, но это — временная мера. Экипажу приказано вооружиться и вознести молитву за успех Лорд-капитана и Главного технопровидца!"

{n}The Vox Master's voice is extremely tense but carries no hint of shameful panic.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, warp spawn have invaded the ship. We have blocked their advance by depressurising one of the infirmaries in their path, but it is only a temporary measure. The crew have been ordered to arm themselves and pray for the success of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} Enginseer Prime!"
languages.original_text: {n}В голосе Вигдис звучит чудовищное напряжение, но нет и намека на постыдную панику.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, на борту появились варп-отродья. Мы отрезали им путь, разгерметизировав один из лазаретов, лежавший на их пути, но это — временная мера. Экипажу приказано вооружиться и вознести молитву за успех Лорд-капитана и Главного технопровидца!"

The crew have been ordered to arm themselves and pray for the success of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} Chief Enginseer!"

The crew have been ordered to arm themselves and pray for the success of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} Enginseer Prime!"

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme der Voxmeisterin ist äußerst angespannt lässt aber keinerlei beschämende Panik erkennen.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, das Schiff wurde von Warpgezücht infiltriert. Wir haben ihren Vormarsch durch die Dekomprimierung der Lazarette auf ihrem Weg gestoppt, aber das ist nur eine temporäre Maßnahme. Die Crew wurde angewiesen, sich zu bewaffnen und für den Erfolg des Lord Captains und {mf|seines|ihres} Maschinenseher Primus zu beten."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master's voice is extremely tense but carries no hint of shameful panic.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, warp spawn have invaded the ship. We have blocked their advance by depressurising one of the infirmaries in their path, but it is only a temporary measure. The crew have been ordered to arm themselves and pray for the success of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} Enginseer Prime!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme der Voxmeisterin ist äußerst angespannt lässt aber keinerlei beschämende Panik erkennen.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, das Schiff wurde von Warpgezücht infiltriert. Wir haben ihren Vormarsch durch die Dekomprimierung der Lazarette auf ihrem Weg gestoppt, aber das ist nur eine temporäre Maßnahme. Die Crew wurde angewiesen, sich zu bewaffnen und für den Erfolg des Lord Captains und {mf|seines|ihres} Maschinenseher Primus zu beten.

languages.text: {n}La voix de la maîtresse-vox est extrêmement tendue, mais ne dénote aucune panique honteuse.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, des rejetons du Warp ont envahi le vaisseau. Nous avons bloqué leur progression en dépressurisant l'une des infirmeries sur leur trajet, mais ce n'est qu'une mesure temporaire. L'équipage a reçu l'ordre de s'armer et de prier pour le succès {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et de son technaugure primus ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master's voice is extremely tense but carries no hint of shameful panic.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, warp spawn have invaded the ship. We have blocked their advance by depressurising one of the infirmaries in their path, but it is only a temporary measure. The crew have been ordered to arm themselves and pray for the success of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} Enginseer Prime!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de la maîtresse-vox est extrêmement tendue, mais ne dénote aucune panique honteuse.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, des rejetons du Warp ont envahi le vaisseau. Nous avons bloqué leur progression en dépressurisant l'une des infirmeries sur leur trajet, mais ce n'est qu'une mesure temporaire. L'équipage a reçu l'ordre de s'armer et de prier pour le succès {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et de son technaugure primus ! »

languages.text: {n}音阵大师发来了信息，尽管她的声音非常紧张，但却并没有任何恐慌的意味。{/n}“大人，亚空间的怪物侵入了这艘飞船。我们已经对必经之路的船舱进行了减压，暂时阻止了他们继续入侵。不过，这只是个临时措施。所有船员已经得到命令，武装起来，为舰长大人您与尊敬的贤者祈祷，祝你们一切顺利！”
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master's voice is extremely tense but carries no hint of shameful panic.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, warp spawn have invaded the ship. We have blocked their advance by depressurising one of the infirmaries in their path, but it is only a temporary measure. The crew have been ordered to arm themselves and pray for the success of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} Enginseer Prime!"

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵大师发来了信息，尽管她的声音非常紧张，但却并没有任何恐慌的意味。{/n}“大人，亚空间的怪物侵入了这艘飞船。我们已经对必经之路的船舱进行了减压，暂时阻止了他们继续入侵。不过，这只是个临时措施。所有船员已经得到命令，武装起来，为舰长大人您与尊敬的贤者祈祷，祝你们一切顺利！”

languages.text: {n}ヴォクス・マスターの声は極度に緊迫しているが、みっともなくパニックに陥っているような様子は微塵もない。{/n}「陛下、ワープスポーンが船に侵入しました。奴らのルート上の医療室を減圧して侵攻を防ぎましたが、これは一時しのぎでしかありません。クルーには武装命令と、ロード・キャプテンおよび機関整備師主任の成功を祈るように指示が出されています！」
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master's voice is extremely tense but carries no hint of shameful panic.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, warp spawn have invaded the ship. We have blocked their advance by depressurising one of the infirmaries in their path, but it is only a temporary measure. The crew have been ordered to arm themselves and pray for the success of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} Enginseer Prime!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクス・マスターの声は極度に緊迫しているが、みっともないパニックに陥っているような様子は微塵もない。{/n}「陛下、ワープスポーンが船に侵入した。奴らのルート上の医療室を減圧して侵攻を防いだが、これは一時しのぎでしかない。クルーには武装命令と、ロード・キャプテンおよび主任旗艦整備師の成功を祈るように指示が出されている！」
{n}ヴォクス・マスターの声は極度に緊迫しているが、みっともなくパニックに陥っているような様子は微塵もない。{/n}「陛下、ワープスポーンが船に侵入しました。奴らのルート上の医療室を減圧して侵攻を防ぎましたが、これは一時しのぎでしかありません。クルーには武装命令と、ロード・キャプテンおよび機関整備師主任の成功を祈るように指示が出されています！」

languages.text: {n}La maestra de vocos habla con un tono extremadamente tenso, pero no muestra el más mínimo indicio de pánico.{/n} «{mf|Milord|Milady}, las criaturas de la disformidad han invadido la nave. Hemos detenido su avance despresurizando una de las enfermerías a su paso, pero es sólo una medida temporal. La tripulación ha recibido la orden de tomar las armas y rezar por el éxito de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán y su visioingeniero primero».
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master's voice is extremely tense but carries no hint of shameful panic.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, warp spawn have invaded the ship. We have blocked their advance by depressurising one of the infirmaries in their path, but it is only a temporary measure. The crew have been ordered to arm themselves and pray for the success of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} Enginseer Prime!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La maestra de vocos habla con un tono extremadamente tenso, pero no muestra el más mínimo indicio de pánico.{/n} «{mf|Milord|Milady}, las criaturas de la disformidad han invadido la nave. Hemos detenido su avance despresurizando una de las enfermerías a su paso, pero es sólo una medida temporal. La tripulación ha recibido la orden de tomar las armas y rezar por el éxito de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán y su visioingeniero primero».

languages.text: {n}Voks Üstadı'nın sesi son derece gergin olsa da herhangi bir panik tınısı barındırmıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, öteboyut varlıkları gemiyi istila etti. Önlerindeki revirlerden bir tanesindeki basıncı boşaltarak ilerlemelerinin önüne geçtik ancak bu yalnızca geçici bir önlem. Mürettebata silahlanma ve Lord Kaptan ile Başmühedyum'unun başarısı için dua etme emri verildi!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master's voice is extremely tense but carries no hint of shameful panic.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, warp spawn have invaded the ship. We have blocked their advance by depressurising one of the infirmaries in their path, but it is only a temporary measure. The crew have been ordered to arm themselves and pray for the success of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} Enginseer Prime!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Voks Üstadı'nın sesi son derece gergin ama içinde kesinlikle panik barındırmıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, öteboyut varlıkları gemiyi istila etti. Önlerindeki revirlerden bir tanesindeki basıncı boşaltarak ilerlemelerinin önüne geçtik ancak bu yalnızca geçici bir önlem. Mürettebata silahlanma ve Lord Kaptan ile onun Başmühedyumunun başarısı için dua etme emri verildi!"
